creator: pratik.jain@alepo.com
text:
Created attachment 27015
Internal Server Error500Logs

HI 
when I am trying to replay recorded script (recorded in Badboy and then Exported to Jmeter) in Jmeter its giving "Internal Server Error 500". the framework I am using is Wicket. (I don't thing Jmeter any thing to do with wicket, correct me if I am wrong)

I Have 4 Http request in one thread. all first three request Pass successfully but it fails on 4th step. I have also used "HTTP Cookie Manager" and Regex for extracting Jsessionid from URL.

Jmeter Logs for Reference.
*************************
2011/05/17 15:34:54 INFO  - jmeter.threads.JMeterThread: Thread started: Thread Group 1-1 
2011/05/17 15:35:06 ERROR - jmeter.protocol.http.sampler.HTTPSampler: readResponse: java.io.IOException: Server returned HTTP response code: 500 for URL: http://ip:port/wsrc/app/;jsessionid=47197AA656E5112284C9A3431E439FF1 
2011/05/17 15:35:06 ERROR - jmeter.protocol.http.sampler.HTTPSampler: Cause: java.io.IOException: Server returned HTTP response code: 500 for URL: http://ip:port/wsrc/app/;jsessionid=47197AA656E5112284C9A3431E439FF1 
2011/05/17 15:35:06 INFO  - jmeter.protocol.http.sampler.HTTPSampler: Error Response Code: 500 
2011/05/17 15:35:06 INFO  - jmeter.threads.JMeterThread: Thread finished: Thread Group 1-1 

Please let me know if you need more information.
Awaiting for your reply.


Thanks,
Pratik Jain

creator: milamber@apache.org
text:
Buzgilla isn't a support forum, please use jmeter user mailing list

Badboy isn't supported by JMeter
HTTP Error 500 is a problem on your web server.
